FuncDef: This command binds a service to an existing Service Distribution Point (SDP), using a dynamic MS-PW.
CLIs: spoke-sdp-fec <spoke-sdp-fec-id> [ fec <fec-type> ] [ aii-type <aii-type> ] [ create ] endpoint <name> [ icb ]

ParaDef.Info: An unsigned integer value identifying the spoke SDP. Values-1 to 4294967295.
An unsigned integer value for the type of the FEC used by the MS-PW. Values-129 to 130.
An unsigned integer value for the Attachment Individual Identifier (AII) type used to identify the MS-PW endpoints. Values-1 to 2.
Specifies the name of the service endpoint.
Adds or removes a spoke SDP association.
Configures the spoke SDP as an inter-chassis backup SDP binding.
